entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
